name: Our Frozen Desolation
description:
Welcome to "Our Frozen Desolation"! 

It's a dead chilling winter!

The game takes place in the middle of winter.
A parasite that lives in the snow takes control of the human population, making them living undeads that try to attack anything living in it’s path, converting them to mindless walkers.

This game builds on the same idea as Arvidsjaur, a previous game i have made. Although this game is not a sequel per say, but more of a spiritual successor, since it having a new name (yes the previous name is pretty confusing) and new features with a real story.
